questions.question: When was the Civil Engineering Department established?
questions.answer: The department was established in 1987.

questions.question: What was the initial intake for the undergraduate program?
questions.answer: The initial intake was 60 students.

questions.question: When was the annual intake increased, and to what number?
questions.answer: The annual intake was increased to 120 students starting from the academic year 2012-13.

questions.question: What postgraduate programs does the department offer, and when were they started?
questions.answer: The department offers M.Tech programs in Construction Technology (started in 2010 with an intake of 18) and Structural Engineering (started in 2017 with an intake of 24).

questions.question: Is the department recognized as a Research Centre?
questions.answer: Yes, the department is recognized as a Research Centre offering M.Sc. (Engg.) and Ph.D. programs.

questions.question: How many research scholars are currently pursuing their Ph.D. in the department?
questions.answer: There are 9 research scholars currently pursuing their Ph.D.

questions.question: What activities does the Department Students' Association (OCEAN) organize for Civil Engineering students?
questions.answer: OCEAN organizes seminars, workshops, educational tours, design competitions, Leadership Training, Personality Development Training, and Entrepreneurship Development Programmes.

questions.question: Has the department undertaken any funded projects? If so, could you provide examples?
questions.answer: Yes, the department has taken up Karnataka State Council for Science & Technology (KSCST) funded projects and is also working on developing Masonry blocks and Paver blocks using Industrial waste materials under Karnataka New Age Incubation Centre, NMAMIT funded by the Department of IT, BT and S & T, government of Karnataka.

questions.question: What is the focus of the M.Tech program in Construction Technology?
questions.answer: The focus of the M.Tech program in Construction Technology is not explicitly mentioned in the provided information.

questions.question: How does the department support entrepreneurship among its students?
questions.answer: The department supports entrepreneurship development through Entrepreneurship Development Programmes organized by OCEAN.

questions.question: What motivated the increase in the annual intake from 60 to 120 students?
questions.answer: The motivation behind the increase in the annual intake is not specified in the provided information.

questions.question: What types of research areas are covered in the M.Sc. (Engg.) and Ph.D. programs?
questions.answer: The specific research areas covered in the M.Sc. (Engg.) and Ph.D. programs are not mentioned in the provided information.

questions.question: How does the department engage with industry partners for research and projects?
questions.answer: The department engages with industry partners through funded projects and collaborations, such as those with KSCST and the Karnataka New Age Incubation Centre.

questions.question: What benefits do students gain from participating in seminars, workshops, and educational tours organized by OCEAN?
questions.answer: Students gain knowledge, skills, and networking opportunities from participating in seminars, workshops, and educational tours organized by OCEAN.

questions.question: What is the significance of the Masonry blocks and Paver blocks project undertaken by the department?
questions.answer: The significance lies in utilizing industrial waste materials for sustainable construction practices and addressing environmental concerns.

questions.question: How does the department ensure the quality of its postgraduate programs?
questions.answer: The department ensures the quality of its postgraduate programs through rigorous academic standards, faculty expertise, and industry relevance.

questions.question: Are there any collaborations or partnerships with governmental agencies besides KSCST?
questions.answer: Yes, the department collaborates with the Department of IT, BT and S & T, Government of Karnataka, for funded projects related to technological innovation.

questions.question: What opportunities are provided for students to gain practical experience in construction technology and structural engineering?
questions.answer: Practical experience is gained through hands-on projects, laboratory work, and field visits organized as part of the curriculum.

questions.question: How does the department foster a culture of research among its students and faculty?
questions.answer: The department fosters a research culture through its Research Centre status, funded projects, and opportunities for advanced study at the M.Sc. (Engg.) and Ph.D. levels.

questions.question: What impact do the department's research projects have on the local community and industry?
questions.answer: The research projects contribute to solving local challenges, promoting sustainable practices, and enhancing the competitiveness of the local industry through innovation and technology transfer.

questions.question: What is the vision of the Civil Engineering Department?
questions.answer: The vision is to uphold the department as a leader in community development through innovation and excellence in diverse areas of Civil Engineering to meet global challenges and market demands.

questions.question: What is the mission of the Civil Engineering Department?
questions.answer: The mission includes providing students with strong theoretical knowledge and practical skills in various Civil Engineering subjects, preparing them to be competent and skilled in research, consultancy, and entrepreneurship, and encouraging the development of professional ethics through discipline and principles.

questions.question: How does the department aim to achieve its vision?
questions.answer: The department aims to achieve its vision by focusing on innovation, excellence, and community development in diverse areas of Civil Engineering.

questions.question: What is the focus of the department's mission regarding students' knowledge and skills?
questions.answer: The focus is on providing students with a strong theoretical knowledge and practical skills to understand the basic concepts and fundamentals of various Civil Engineering subjects.

questions.question: In what areas does the department aim to excel to meet global challenges and market demands?
questions.answer: The department aims to excel in diverse areas of Civil Engineering to meet global challenges and market demands.

questions.question: How does the department plan to prepare students for challenges in research, consultancy, and entrepreneurship?
questions.answer: The department plans to provide students with competency and skills necessary to take on challenges in research, consultancy, and entrepreneurship.

questions.question: What values does the department seek to instill in its students?
questions.answer: The department seeks to instill professional ethics through discipline and principles in its students.

questions.question: What role does innovation play in achieving the department's vision?
questions.answer: Innovation is essential for upholding the department as a leader in community development and meeting global challenges and market demands.

questions.question: How does the department plan to support students in developing practical skills?
questions.answer: The department plans to provide practical training and hands-on experience to students in various Civil Engineering subjects.

questions.question: What opportunities does the department offer for students to engage in research?
questions.answer: The department offers opportunities for students to engage in research through projects, internships, and collaborations with faculty members.

questions.question: What resources does the department provide to support students in consultancy projects?
questions.answer: The department provides access to faculty expertise, laboratory facilities, and industry connections to support students in consultancy projects.

questions.question: How does the department encourage entrepreneurship among its students?
questions.answer: The department encourages entrepreneurship by providing training, mentorship, and networking opportunities to students interested in starting their ventures.

questions.question: What methods does the department employ to promote discipline among students?
questions.answer: The department promotes discipline through a structured curriculum, codes of conduct, and mentorship programs.

questions.question: How does the department integrate principles into its educational programs?
questions.answer: The department integrates principles into its educational programs through ethics courses, case studies, and role modeling by faculty members.

questions.question: How does the department contribute to community development?
questions.answer: The department contributes to community development through research projects, outreach programs, and collaborations with local organizations.

questions.question: What measures does the department take to ensure its curriculum remains relevant to market demands?
questions.answer: The department regularly reviews its curriculum, consults with industry professionals, and updates course content to align with market demands.

questions.question: How does the department foster a culture of excellence among its students and faculty?
questions.answer: The department fosters a culture of excellence through high academic standards, research achievements, and recognition of student and faculty accomplishments.

questions.question: What role do practical skills play in the department's mission?
questions.answer: Practical skills are essential for students to understand and apply theoretical concepts effectively, thus fulfilling the department's mission.

questions.question: How does the department engage with industry partners to address market demands?
questions.answer: The department collaborates with industry partners through internships, joint projects, and advisory boards to stay informed about market demands and industry trends.

questions.question: How does the department measure the success of its mission and vision?
questions.answer: The department measures success through student achievements, faculty research output, community impact, and recognition within the field of Civil Engineering.

questions.question: What are Dr. I Ramesh Mithanthayya's educational qualifications?
questions.answer: Dr. I Ramesh Mithanthayya has a B.E. in Civil Engineering, M.Tech in Industrial Structure, MBA in HRM, and a Ph.D.

questions.question: What is Dr. I Ramesh Mithanthayya's past experience?
questions.answer: Dr. I Ramesh Mithanthayya has served as a Lecturer, Sr. Lecturer, Asst. Professor, Assoc. Professor, Associate Professor & Head of Civil Engineering, Chief Project Leader, Professor, Vice Principal & Dean (Academic), and Faculty of Engineering in Bahir Dar University, Bahir Dar, Ethiopia.

questions.question: What are Dr. I Ramesh Mithanthayya's areas of interest?
questions.answer: Dr. I Ramesh Mithanthayya's areas of interest include Structural Engineering, Materials and Structures for sustainable Infrastructure, Geotechnical Engineering, and use of non-conventional materials for construction, Steel structures & its maintenance.

questions.question: What are Dr. I Ramesh Mithanthayya's professional memberships?
questions.answer: Dr. I Ramesh Mithanthayya is a Life Member of India Society for Technical Education (ISTE), Member of The Institution of Engineers (India), Member of Indian Geotechnical Society (IGS), Fellow Member of Indian Valuer (FIV), and Member of Indian Road Congress (IRC).

questions.question: What subjects does Dr. I Ramesh Mithanthayya handle?
questions.answer: Dr. I Ramesh Mithanthayya handles subjects including Engineering Mechanics, Structural Analysis, Bridge Engineering, Transportation Engineering, Matrix Analysis of Structures, Strength of materials, Structural Design, Civil Engineering Management, Building Construction.

questions.question: What are Dr. I Ramesh Mithanthayya's conference/journal publications?
questions.answer: Dr. I Ramesh Mithanthayya has participated in and presented at various conferences and workshops, including the ISTE-WINTER SCHOOL, Workshop on Ground Water Techniques, National Seminar on Vastu and Vastupurusha, National Conference on Granite Mining, Seminar on Valuation for Banks, Workshop on Maintenance of building in South Kanara District, National Seminar on Recent Development in Geotechnical Engineering, and many others.

questions.answer: Dr. A N Parameswaran's areas of interest include Engineering Education and Structural Engineering.

questions.question: What are Dr. Bhojaraja B E's conference/journal publications?

questions.question: What achievements does Mr. Thushar Shetty have?
questions.answer: Mr. Thushar Shetty has received a Best Paper Award for "Analysis of L-Shaped RC Columns subjected to bending with axial load using Moment-Curvature Relationship" and has won several sports tournaments.

questions.question: What subjects does Mr. Thushar Shetty handle?
questions.answer: Mr. Thushar Shetty handles subjects including Elements of Civil Engineering and Engineering Mechanics, Structural Analysis-I & II, Design of Pre-stressed Concrete Structures, Building Planning and Drawing, Computer Aided Civil Engineering Drawing.

questions.question: What are Mr. Thushar Shetty's conference/journal publications?
questions.answer: Mr. Thushar Shetty has published several papers in various journals, including "Influence of Bracing Systems on Seismic Performance of Steel Structures with Plan Irregularity", "Comparative study on seismic performance of specially shaped RC columns with that of rectangular columns in high-rise structures", and "Seismic Behavior of Different configuration of Multi-Storey RC Buildings on Sloping Ground: A Review".

questions.answer: Mr. Thushar Shetty has been involved in various activities including staff in-charge for "Nitte Half Marathon", staff coordinator for "Nitte Cross Country 2016", and organizer of international and national workshops.

questions.question: What are Dr. Pushparaj's educational qualifications?
questions.answer: Dr. Pushparaj has an AMIE, an M.Tech, and a Ph.D.

questions.answer: Dr. Pushparaj has 17 years of experience.

questions.question: What achievements does Dr. Pushparaj have?

questions.question: What are Dr. Pushparaj's departmental responsibilities?
questions.answer: Dr. Pushparaj serves as the P.G Co-ordinator and Lab incharge.

questions.question: What are Dr. Pushparaj's professional memberships?
questions.answer: Dr. Pushparaj is a member of MISTE.

questions.question: What subjects does Dr. Pushparaj handle?
questions.answer: Dr. Pushparaj handles subjects including Engineering Management, Environmental Engineering, Concrete Technology, Reuse and Recycle Technology, Building services and Maintenance, Construction and Contract Management, Building Construction.

questions.question: What are Dr. Pushparaj's conference/journal publications?

questions.question: What are Dr. Mithun B M's educational qualifications?
questions.answer: Dr. Mithun B M has a B.E in Construction Technology & Management from SJCE Mysore, an M.Tech in Construction Technology & Management from NITK, Surathkal, and is currently pursuing a Ph.D in Civil Engineering on Alkali Activated Concrete Mixes from NITK Surathkal.

questions.question: What is Dr. Mithun B M's past experience?
questions.answer: Dr. Mithun B M has 4 years of teaching experience and 1 year of industry experience.

questions.question: What are Dr. Mithun B M's areas of interest?
questions.answer: Dr. Mithun B M's areas of interest include Concrete Technology, Rigid Pavements, Stabilised Mud Blocks, Paver Blocks, Eco-friendly Materials.

questions.question: What achievements does Dr. Mithun B M have?
questions.answer: Dr. Mithun B M has qualified in GATE 2008 with 88.7 Percentile, received a Best Paper Award in 3rd World Conference on Applied Sciences, Engineering and Technology in September 2014, Kathmandu, NEPAL, and was awarded the EAE - Young Achiever award in 2017.

questions.question: What are Dr. Mithun B M's professional memberships?
questions.answer: Dr. Mithun B M is a member of ISTE, IEI, and ISSE.

questions.question: What subjects does Dr. Mithun B M handle?
questions.answer: Dr. Mithun B M handles subjects including Engineering Management, Concrete Technology, Advanced Concrete Technology, Alternative Building Materials and Technologies, Sustainable Building Materials, Quality & Safety in Construction, Quality Safety and Quantitative Methods in Construction, Construction Economics, Sustainable Concretes, Infrastructure Development - Programmes Planning & Appraisal.

questions.question: What are Dr. Mithun B M's conference/journal publications?
questions.answer: Dr. Mithun B M has published several papers in various journals, including "Performance of slag-fly ash based alkali activated concrete for paver applications utilizing powdered waste glass as a binding ingredient" in the International Journal of Pavement Research and Technology, and "A Study on Elastic Deformation Behavior of Steel Fiber-Reinforced Concrete for Pavements" in the Journal of The Institution of Engineers (India): Series A.

questions.question: What is Dr. Mithun B M's additional information?
questions.answer: Dr. Mithun B M has published in journals such as Journal of Cleaner Production, Archives of Civil and Mechanical Engineering, Construction & Building Materials, Materials and Design, Resources, Conservation & Recycling, International Journal of Sustainable Built Environment, Frontiers of Structural and Civil Engineering, and Springer.

questions.question: What are Dr. Shanmukha Shetty's educational qualifications?
questions.answer: Dr. Shanmukha Shetty has a B.E, an M.Tech, and a Ph.D.

questions.question: What is Dr. Shanmukha Shetty's past experience?
questions.answer: Dr. Shanmukha Shetty has 1 year of experience.

questions.question: What are Dr. Shanmukha Shetty's areas of interest?
questions.answer: Dr. Shanmukha Shetty's areas of interest include Continuum Mechanics, Structural Dynamics, Structural Analysis, Strength of Materials, Finite Element Analysis, Theory of Plates and Shells, Stability of Structures, Engineering Mechanics, Design of Reinforced Concrete Structures, Design of Bridges.

questions.question: What achievements does Dr. Shanmukha Shetty have?
questions.answer: Dr. Shanmukha Shetty has received a Best Paper award in ICETSTES-2018 and is certified in several NPTEL Online courses.

questions.question: What are Dr. Shanmukha Shetty's departmental responsibilities?
questions.answer: Dr. Shanmukha Shetty serves as the Co-ordinator of ISTE & IEI.

questions.question: What are Dr. Shanmukha Shetty's professional memberships?
questions.answer: Dr. Shanmukha Shetty is a Life Member of the Indian Society for Technical Education (ISTE) and a Life Member of ISSE.

questions.question: What subjects does Dr. Shanmukha Shetty handle?
questions.answer: Dr. Shanmukha Shetty handles subjects including Elements of Civil Engineering & Engineering Mechanics, Strength of Materials, Structural Analysis, Design and Drawing of Reinforced concrete structures, Design of Bridges, Building materials and construction technology, Building Planning and Drawing, Basic Material Testing Lab, Geotechnical Engineering Lab, Surveying Practice Lab, Environmental Engineering Lab.

questions.question: What are Dr. Shanmukha Shetty's conference/journal publications?
questions.answer: Dr. Shanmukha Shetty has published several papers in various journals, including "Utilization of waste plastic in manufacturing plastic soil bricks" in the International Journal Of Technology Enhancements And Emerging Engineering Research, and "An Analytical Investigation on Behavior of Cross (+) Shaped RC Columns Using PU-MU Interaction Diagrams" in the Bonfring International Journal Of Man Machine Interface.

questions.question: What is Dr. Shanmukha Shetty's additional information?
questions.answer: Dr. Shanmukha Shetty has participated in various workshops, orientation programs, FDPs, and national-level workshops on topics ranging from design of tall buildings to sustainable smart cities and entrepreneurship development.
